mapper.select: SELECT * FROM project p JOIN task t ON p.project_no = t.project_no JOIN member m ON t.member_no = m.member_no WHERE m.member_no = #{m.member_no} AND t.task_title != '' AND t.task_content != '';

SELECT * FROM member m JOIN project_member pm ON m.member_no = pm.member_no JOIN project p ON pm.project_no = p.project_no WHERE m.member_no = #{m.member_no} AND p.project_title != "" AND p.project_title is not null;

SELECT * FROM task t JOIN member m ON t.member_no = m.member_no JOIN project p ON t.project_no = p.project_no WHERE p.project_title LIKE #{project_title} AND t.task_title != '' AND t.task_content != '' and t.member_no = #{member_no} and t.project_no = #{project_no}
